item.title: Lazy loading Components with ComponentLoader
item.description: Check out my post Lazy Loading Components with ComponentLoader on ModusCreate to find out how to use Sencha ComponentLoader to build lazy loading Components or Views.

item.title: Sencha ViewModel Tips
item.description: Check out my post Sencha ViewModel Tips on ModusCreate blog for great tips. Also you can find the latest Revision updated and anytime on my github account (or embedded below). Soon more to come with great ExtJS6 stuff.
